LanguageData.OE_MechQueenGrip.label: queen's grip
LanguageData.OE_MechQueenGrip.description: Queen's Grip grant the Arachna Queen an ability to teleport the target right next to the caster. Objects which are too large cannot be teleported.
LanguageData.OE_MechQueenCurse.label: queen's curse
LanguageData.OE_MechQueenCurse.description: Queen's Curse grant the Arachna Queen an ability to fully disarm the target and increases incoming damage for an extended 12 hours.
LanguageData.OE_MechDroneJump.label: drone assault
